item.title: Hotels
item.description:
Whether you stay in the city, or within the province, there are plenty of places to stay! Here are some of our recommendations.

Groningen (City)

City Hotel Groningen

Gedempte Kattendiep 25
9711 PM Groningen
Netherlands

Best Western Hotel Groningen Centre

Radesingel 50
9711 EK Groningen
Netherlands

The Market Hotel

Grote Markt 31
9712 HS Groningen
Netherlands

Groningen (Province)

Hotel Spoorzicht

Molenweg 11
9919 AE Loppersum
Netherlands

Eemshotel

Zeebadweg 2
9933 AV Delfzijl
Netherlands

Estate Ekenstein

Alberdaweg 70
9901 TA Appingedam
Netherlands

3:00 PM - Arrival

3:30 PM - Ceremony in Church

4:30 PM - Prosecco and Alcohol Free Aperitif

5:00 PM - 3 Course dinner with included drinks

7:30 PM - Coffee/Tea and treats

8:00 PM - Party!

12:00 AM - Pierogies

item.title: Information
item.description:
Location

Kerk van wirdum

Kerkeweg 24,
9917 PJ Wirdum

A thirteenth century church within the Groninger countryside. An idyllic location due to the green and peaceful atmosphere.

Location

’t Regthuys

Fromaweg 1,
9917 PK Wirdum

The Regthuys is a lovely restaurant in idyllic Wirdum, a quaint town in the Groninger countryside.

Taxis: Taxi UVO

Phone number: 0595-412611

Alternatively, you can let a member of staff help you get a taxi.

Parking

There will be parking at the Regthuys.

Directions:

By Car:

By Public Transit:

Please note that there is quite a walk from the bus stop to the ceremony and reception location.

Photo policy: Feel free to take some photos of your own, as long as you share them with us. If you do post on social media, please use the #jetfieldwedding hashtag.
